roleset.name: occurring at widely spaced intervals, not dense

role.descr: Thing that is not dense, sparse

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in Thyme, framed by Claire. Comparison to rare-j.01.

example.name: Thyme example
example.text: I see no clear - cut benefit of trying to obtain tissue diagnosis seeing as how the lesion is nonenhancing and is rather sparse.
